title: Yu Su Ge - Vegan Cafeteria Heaven
description: Name 御素阁全自助餐厅, address 锦江区青年路67号蜀农大酒店4楼(近九龙广场). Popular self serve vegetarian buffet restaurant, seats up to 150. Cost is around RMB 15-18 per person. Eat as much as you want vegan hotpot or individual dishes. Offers many main dishes plus hot soymilk, tea, juice, coffee, salad; some food is spicy. Vegan cookies for after dinner. Directions: exit Tianfu Square station (line 1, 2), with a statue of Mao Zedong facing you in front, turn left, and there will be a hotel on your side of the street, continue til you find a Starbucks and street bridge on your side, turn right on that street, and you will see an intersection called Qingnian road. Go straight through that road, and you will see Kowlwoon plaza. Yu Su Ge will be opposite the Plaza on the 4th floor.
streetAddress: 4F Shunong Hotel, 67 Qingnian Rd, Jinjiang District
